column1: Smoque BBQ////My buddy had the St Louis ribs
column2: with mac & cheese and fries for sides.  He said that the ribs were quite tasty
column4: and while not cooked so that the meat was falling off the bone
column5: it was close to that.  He didn't care for the BBQ sauce and said he preferred Sweet Baby Ray's. His thoughts about the slaw and fries mirrored mine.
